## validQueenMoves() function

Get all valid moves for the tile at the given coordinate acting as a queen.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function validQueenMoves(board: GameBoard, coordinate: HexCoordinate): HexCoordinate[];
```

</th><th>

Description

</td><td>

A game board.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

coordinate


</td><td>

[HexCoordinate](./hive-lib.hexcoordinate.md)


</td><td>

The location of the tile acting as a queen.


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>
**Returns:**

[HexCoordinate](./hive-lib.hexcoordinate.md)<!-- -->\[\]

An array of hex coordinates.

## Remarks

The queen rules state that a queen bee can move only one space per turn.
